726192f-a.text:
Bowne Street, east side, north from Sanford to 41st Avenues,
showing a row of old mansions.
P. L. Sperr  April 8, 1927
726192f-a.folder: Bowne Street & Sanford Avenue, Queens, NY

727958f-a.text:
191-213 Sanford Ave., south side, west of Bowne Street (formerly Milton Street.) The first house in this view is No. 213. The first three houses were standing in 1873. The Walker Estate owned practically the whole of the south side of Sanford Ave. between Bowne and Union
Streets.
March 1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
727958f-a.folder: Sanford Avenue & Bowne Street, Queens, NY

727959f-a.text:
213 Sanford Avenue, at the S.W. corner of Bowne Street, showing the Walker house. George, John, a nd Mary Walker were the owners ahout 1873. Another owner was Jos. Dykes.
1922
Eumene L. Armbruster Collection
727959f-a.folder: Sanford Avenue & Bowne Street, Queens, NY
